title: 106_s730
content: Fire Safe Cigarette Act of 1999 - Directs the Consumer Product Safety Commission to promulgate a rule that establishes a fire safety standard for cigarettes, including a prohibition on stockpiling cigarettes covered by such rule. Prohibits the manufacture or import of cigarettes not in compliance with such standard. Authorizes a person adversely affected by such standard to file a petition for judicial review within a specified time period.
